text: Ana nehu'na knazamo'ma rehanima hige'na, hanimpi neviankna hugahuanagi, anankna zamo'ma eme nazeri havizama hu'zankura korora osugahue. Na'ankure Ra Anumzamoka sipisipi kva vahe'mo'zama e'nerizankna azompaka'ane, sipisipima runeharizankna knonka'a eri'nenka nagrane mani'nanke'na ana zama negogeno'a, narimpamo'a fru nehie.
